T02bsu031_u:3: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ |
T02bsu031_u:4: athāyuṣmān śāriputro yena maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya caṃkramaḥ, tenopasamakramīt
T02bsu031_u:5: upasaṃkramya anyonyaṃ saṃmodanīyāṃ kathāṃ bahuvidhāṃ vyatisārayitvā ubhau śilātale upāviśatām
T02bsu031_u:7: adyātra śālistambamavalokya maitreya bhagavatā bhikṣubhyaḥ sūtramidamuktam
T02bsu031_u:8: - yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati, sa dharmaṃ paśyati |
T02bsu031_u:9: yo dharmaṃ paśyati, sa buddhaṃ paśyati |
T02bsu031_u:11: atha maitreya sugatoktasūtrāntasya arthaḥ katamaḥ? pratītyasamutpādaḥ katamaḥ?
T02bsu031_u:12: dharma katamaḥ? buddhaḥ katamaḥ? kathaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyan dharmaṃ
T02bsu031_u:13: paśyati? kathaṃ dharmaṃ paśyan buddhaṃ paśyati?
T02bsu031_u:14: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - atra yaduktaṃ bhadanta śāriputra bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena - yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati, sa dharmaṃ paśyati |
T02bsu031_u:15: yo dharmaṃ paśyati, sa buddhaṃ paśyati iti, tatra katamaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma? pratītyasamutpādo nāma yadidam - asmin sati idaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate |
T02bsu031_u:27: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
T02bsu031_u:39: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati |
T02bsu031_u:42: tadyathā - samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ
T02bsu031_u:44: ayamukto bhagavatā āryāṣṭāṅgiko mārgaḥ phalalābhanirvāṇaikasaṃgṛhīto dharmaḥ ||
T02bsu031_u:45: tatra katamo buddho bhagavān? yaḥ sarvadharmāvabodhādbuddha ucyate, sa āryaprajñānetraḥ dharmakāyasamanvitaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣadharmānimān paśyati ||
T02bsu031_u:46: tatra kathaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati? ihoktaṃ bhagavatā - ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitam, ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati, (sa dharmaṃ
T02bsu031_u:48: yastu evaṃ dharmaṃ (ŚālSū, Vaidya 101) satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati, so 'nuttaradharmaśarīraṃ
T02bsu031_u:51: pratītyasamutpāda iti kasmāducyate? sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko
T02bsu031_u:54: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaiveṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā yāvadyaiṣā dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā pratītyasamutpādasamatā tathatā aviparītatathatā ananyatathatā bhūtatā satyatā aviparītatā aviparyayatā iti ||
T02bsu031_u:55: atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate |
T02bsu031_u:58: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamāḥ? yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuraḥ |
T02bsu031_u:68: bhavati, yāvadasati puṣpe phalaṃ na bhavati |
T02bsu031_u:70: aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati, evaṃ yāvat sati puṣpe phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati |
T02bsu031_u:73: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti |
T02bsu031_u:74: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti |

T02bsu031_u:77: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ |
T02bsu031_u:79: kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnā samudāyāt
T02bsu031_u:90: bhavati, evamaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātavaścāvikalā bhavanti, tataḥ savaṣāṃ samavāyādbīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati |

T02bsu031_u:93: tejodhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjaṃ paripācayāmḥti |
T02bsu031_u:96: ākāśadhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomḥti |
T02bsu031_u:97: ṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomḥti |
T02bsu031_u:98: bḥjasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ bḥjaṃ (aṅkuraṃ?) abhinirvartayāmḥti |
T02bsu031_u:99: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayairabhinirvartita (ŚālSū, Vaidya 102) iti |
T02bsu031_u:100: atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu pratyayeṣu bḥje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttiebhavati |
T02bsu031_u:102: sa ca aṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto
T02bsu031_u:104: atha punaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtudhātusamavāyād bḥje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati
T02bsu031_u:108: pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatataḥ, nocchedataḥ, na saṃkrāntitaḥ, parīttahetuto
T02bsu031_u:112: na ca ya evāṅkuraḥ tadeva bījam |
T02bsu031_u:117: kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddhād bījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate |
T02bsu031_u:120: nirudhyate, tasminneva samaye aṅkura utpadyate tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat |
T02bsu031_u:121: ato nocchedataḥ || kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśo bījādaṅkura iti |
T02bsu031_u:122: ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ || kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ?
T02bsu031_u:124: ataḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ || kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yādṛśaṃ
T02bsu031_u:137: tatra avidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ saṃskārānabhinirvartayāmīti |
T02bsu031_u:140: evaṃ yāvajjāterapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ jarāmaraṇamabhinirvartayāmīti |
T02bsu031_u:147: katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyādādhyātmikasya
T02bsu031_u:149: tatra ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pṛthivīdhātuḥ katamaḥ? yo 'yaṃ kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvamabhinirvartayati, ayamucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ |
T02bsu031_u:151: yaṃ kāyasya aśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati, (ŚālSū, Vaidya 103) ayamucyate tejodhātuḥ
T02bsu031_u:152: yaṃ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karoti, ayamucyate vāyudhātuḥ |
T02bsu031_u:156: pañcavijñānakāyasaṃyuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam, ayamucyate vijñānadhātuḥ |
T02bsu031_u:159: evamaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātavaśca avikalā bhavanti, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyāt kāyasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati
T02bsu031_u:162: abdhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya anuparigrahakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
T02bsu031_u:163: tejodhātorapi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya aśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayāmīti |
T02bsu031_u:164: vāyudhātornaivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ kāyasya āśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
T02bsu031_u:167: kāyasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti |
T02bsu031_u:168: atha ca satsu eṣu pratyayeṣu kāyasyotpattirbhavati ||
T02bsu031_u:169: tatra pṛthivīdhāturnātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantuḥ na manajo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit |
T02bsu031_u:170: evamabdhātustejodhāturvāyudhāturākāśadhāturvijñānadhātuḥ nātmā na sattvo na jīvo na jantuḥ na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cānyasya kasyacit ||
T02bsu031_u:171: tatra avidyā katamā? yā eṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāmekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalasaṃjñā manujamānavasaṃjñā ahaṃkāramamakārasaṃjñā, evamādi vividhamajñānam |
T02bsu031_u:174: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣu, amī(avidyāpratyayāḥ) saṃskārā ityucyante |
T02bsu031_u:177: rūpaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni tāni copādāya rūpam |
T02bsu031_u:192: ye cāpi anye evamādayaḥ kleśāḥ, te upāyāsā iti ||
T02bsu031_u:212: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante - puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āneñjyopagāḥ
T02bsu031_u:213: tatra puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagameva vijñānaṃ bhavati |
T02bsu031_u:224: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati, tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate |
T02bsu031_u:226: yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati, sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate |
T02bsu031_u:227: āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānādhyavasāyasthānādātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhūditi nityamaparityāgāya yaivaṃ prārthanā, idamucyate tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam |
T02bsu031_u:228: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca, sa upādānapratyayo bhava ityucyate |
T02bsu031_u:230: jātyābhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānāmupacayanaparipākādvināśo bhavati, tadidaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamityucyate
T02bsu031_u:232: na nityo nānityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā na kṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno
T02bsu031_u:234: yadyayaṃ dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nyonyahetuko 'nyonyapratyayaḥ, na nityo nānityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā na kṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo na nirodhadharmo 'nādikālapravṛtto 'nucchinno
T02bsu031_u:235: 'nupravartate nadīsrotavat, atha ca imānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante
T02bsu031_u:236: | katamāni catvāri? yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca |
T02bsu031_u:245: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti |
T02bsu031_u:246: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti |

T02bsu031_u:249: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ virohati
T02bsu031_u:251: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto (ŚālSū, Vaidya
T02bsu031_u:252: 105) neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ
T02bsu031_u:253: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogadṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyāt tatra tatra āsvādaviddhaṃ vijñānabījamupapattyāyatanapratisaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau
T02bsu031_u:254: nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati, asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt |
T02bsu031_u:257: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca ālokaṃ ca ākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca
T02bsu031_u:265: yadā tu cakṣurādhyātmikamāyatanamavikalaṃ bhavati, evaṃ rūpālokākāśatajjamanasikārāśca avikalā bhavanti, tataḥ sarveṣāṃ samavāyāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate |
T02bsu031_u:266: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
T02bsu031_u:267: rūpasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya ālambanakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
T02bsu031_u:272: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāhārakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
T02bsu031_u:274: atha ca punaḥ satsu eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati |
T02bsu031_u:279: na ca tatra ādarśamaṇḍale mukhaṃ saṃkrāmati |
T02bsu031_u:290: tasmātsthānāccyutam, parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ bhavati |
T02bsu031_u:295: tadyathā agnirupādānapratyaye sati jvalati, upādānavaikalyānna jvalati,
T02bsu031_u:296: evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatra upapattyāyatanapratisaṃghau mātuḥ kukṣau
T02bsu031_u:297: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt
T02bsu031_u:301: pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatataḥ, nocchedataḥ, na saṃkrāntitaḥ, parīttahetuto
T02bsu031_u:303: kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, anye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ (ŚālSū, Vaidya 106) skandhāḥ, na tu ya evaṃ māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ, ta eva aupapattyaṃśikāḥ |
T02bsu031_u:304: api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante, tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti |
T02bsu031_u:306: kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti, nāpyaniruddheṣu |
T02bsu031_u:307: api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante, tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat |
T02bsu031_u:309: kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāḥ sattvanikāyāḥ sabhāgāyāṃ jātyāṃ jātimabhinirvartayanti |
T02bsu031_u:311: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ? parīttaṃ karma kriyate, vipulaḥ phalavipāko 'nubhūyate |
T02bsu031_u:313: tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yathāvedanīyaṃ karma kriyate, tathāvedanīyo vipāko 'nubhūyate |
T02bsu031_u:315: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputra imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītamevaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitamajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati, asataḥ tucchataḥ riktataḥ asārataḥ rogataḥ gaṇḍataḥ śalyataḥ aghataḥ anityataḥ duḥkhataḥ śūnyataḥ anātmataḥ samanupaśyati, na sa pūrvāntaṃ pratisarati - kiṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani, kathaṃ nvahamabhūvamatīte 'dhvani iti |
T02bsu031_u:316: aparāntaṃ vā na punaḥ pratisarati - kiṃ nvahaṃ bhaviṣyāmyanāgate 'dhvani,
T02bsu031_u:319: pratyutpannaṃ vā punarnaṃ pratisarati - kiṃ nvidam, kathaṃ nvidam, ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ, ime sattvāḥ kuta āgatāḥ, itaścyutāḥ kutra gamiṣyantīti |
T02bsu031_u:320: yāni ekeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ pṛthag loke dṛṣṭigatāni bhaviṣyanti, tadyathā -
T02bsu031_u:321: ātmavādapratisaṃyuktāni sattvavādapratisaṃyuktāni jīvavādapratisaṃyuktāni pudgalavādapratisaṃyuktāni kautukamaṅgalavādapratisaṃyuktāni unmiñjitāni nimiñjitāni ca, tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni
T02bsu031_u:323: yo bhadanta śāriputra evaṃvidhadharmakṣāntisamanvitaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ samyagavagacchati, tasya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavit puruṣadamyasārathiranattaraḥ śāstā
T02bsu031_u:324: devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākaroti - samyaksaṃbuddho buddho bhaviṣyasīti
T02bsu031_u:326: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
